apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

description.description: A short description of the hardware profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the hardware profile.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the hardware profile is available for new resources.

defaultCount.description: The default count can be an integer or a string.

identifier.description: The resource identifier of the hardware device.

maxCount.description: The maximum count can be an integer or a string.

minCount.description: The minimum count can be an integer or a string.

resourceType.description: The type of identifier. could be "CPU" or "Memory". Leave it undefined for the other types.

key.description: The key for the node selector.

value.description: The value for the node selector.

tolerations.description: Any number of Kubernetes toleration values that are added to resources when created or updated to this hardware profile.

effect.description: Taint effect. Empty matches all effects. Allowed: 'NoSchedule', 'PreferNoSchedule', 'NoExecute'.

key.description: Taint key. Empty matches all keys.

operator.description: Relationship with the value. Valid: 'Exists', 'Equal'. Defaults to 'Equal'.

tolerationSeconds.description: Duration in seconds. If effect is 'NoExecute', specifies eviction time. Default is forever.

value.description: Tolerance value. If key is empty, use 'Exists' to match all values and keys.
